name: Qliphort Monolith
text: Unhandled exception at 0x1i-666 in qliphort.exe: Access violation writing location 0x00-000Continue, ignoring this error? <Y/N>...[ ]Xlmgzxg drgs gsv Hzxivw Givv rh uliyrwwvm. Gsv hxlfitv szh yvvm fmovzhsvw.
pendulum_text: You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Qli" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. During the End Phase, if you Tribute Summoned this turn: You can draw a number of cards equal to the number of "Qli" monsters you Tributed for Tribute Summons this turn.
